Method.Name: jcolibri.method.LoadCaseBaseMethod
Method.Description: Loads the Case Base from the persistence layer, using a connector configured in a xml file

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.SelectBestCaseMethod
Method.Description: Selects just the best of the found cases

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.RetrieveComputationalMethod
Method.Description: Simple retrieve strategy

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.CBRSystemMethod
Method.Description: Divides our CBR system into precycle/cycle/postcycle

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.PreCycleMethod
Method.Description: Standard pre cycle method

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.PostCycleMethod
Method.Description: Standard post cycle method

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.CloseConnectorMethod
Method.Description: Closes the case base releasing connector resources

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.SelectAllCasesMethod
Method.Description: Stores all cases as working cases

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.CBRMethod
Method.Description: Main CBR method that will divide CBR process in the four typical tasks.

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.NumericSimComputationMethod
Method.Description: Applies simple numeric similarity measures to cases

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.SelectSomeCasesMethod
Method.Description: Select the cases indicated by user

Parameter.Name: Number of cases
Parameter.Description: Number of cases to be returned

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.ConfigureQueryMethod
Method.Description: Asks user for the query using the XML file generated by jCOLIBRI tools. It also configures similarity functions.

Parameter.Name: Case Structure
Parameter.Description: XML file generated by jCOLIBRI tools

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.ReuseComputationalMethod
Method.Description: Simple reuse strategy. Divides a reuse task into atomic reuse tasks and a main Reuse Task. This way, developers can apply several reuse methods.

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.CopyCasesforAdaptationMethod
Method.Description: Removes evaluation data in retrieved cases.

Parameter.Name: Case Structure
Parameter.Description: XML file generated by jCOLIBRI tools

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.CombineQueryAndCasesMethod
Method.Description: Copies Query description into retrieved cases

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.DirectCopyMethod
Method.Description: Copies a Description attribute value to a solution attribute

Parameter.Name: Description Attribute
Parameter.Description: Attribute from Description to be copied

Parameter.Name: Solution Attribute
Parameter.Description: Attribute from Solution where value must be stored

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.NumericDirectProportionMethod
Method.Description: Computes a direct proportion between NUMERIC description attributes and solution attributes.

Parameter.Name: Description Attribute
Parameter.Description: Attribute from Description that indicates the proportion

Parameter.Name: Solution Attribute
Parameter.Description: Attribute from Solution where proportion must be stored

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.ManualRevisionMethod
Method.Description: Allows user to modify cases

Parameter.Name: Case Structure
Parameter.Description: XML file generated by jCOLIBRI tools

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.RetainComputationalMethod
Method.Description: Simple retain strategy

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.RetainChooserMethod
Method.Description: Allows user to choose cases to store

Parameter.Name: Case Structure
Parameter.Description: XML file generated by jCOLIBRI tools

Method.Name: jcolibri.method.StoreCasesMethod
Method.Description: Stores cases into CaseBase
